Package boundary

Class AccountUI

Object
AccountUI
public class AccountUI extends Object
Static UI boundary class for manageing user interface for login, logout and changePassword functionalities

  • Constructor Summary

    Method
    Description
    static void
    changePasswordMenu()
    Menu for prompting User to change password Validates both password entries User not allowed to change back to deafult password
    static void

    Displays menu for login.
    static void
    logout()
    Displays logout menu for user Calls DataController.save() to write data about current User to persistent memory

  • Constructor Details

    • AccountUI

      public AccountUI()

  • Method Details

    • loginMenu

      public static void loginMenu()
      Displays menu for login. This is the main loop of the program when different users login and logout.
      Prompts User to change password upon first login
      After logging in, dislays the current UI menu for the appropriate User type

    • changePasswordMenu

      public static void changePasswordMenu()
      Menu for prompting User to change password
      Validates both password entries
      User not allowed to change back to deafult password

    • logout

      public static void logout()
      Displays logout menu for user
      Calls DataController.save() to write data about current User to persistent memory
